hero.title: Give your ill-wishers a
hero.description: Tired of hypocritical colleagues, nasty bosses, or ex-lovers who broke your heart? Get your revenge in a unique and tasteful way! Introducing our one-of-a-kind service ‚Äì eco-friendly manure delivery straight to your offender's doorstep!

anonymity.title: Complete anonymity
anonymity.description: No one will ever know that you sent this "surprise." Your payment details and sender's identity are hidden!

delivery.title: Fast delivery
delivery.description: Your "gift" will be delivered anywhere in the world in no time.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: We ensure complete payment confidentiality. The recipient will never know who sent the gift.

step1.title: Choose a product
step1.description: Select the item you're interested in from our range.

step2.title: Choose packaging
step2.description: Choose your preferred packaging for your product.

step3.title: Write a comment
step3.description: Leave a special comment on your order that will be printed on the packaging.

step4.title: Waiting for shipping
step4.description: After receiving your order, we send the package to the address you selected.

reviews.title: Our anonymous reviews
reviews.review1: Sent this to a friend, and he was completely baffled! He couldn't figure out who sent it or why. Perfect for pranking someone!
reviews.review2: This was brilliant! My coworker received it and spent a week trying to understand what to do with it. So much laughter!
reviews.review3: The perfect prank gift! The recipient's reaction was priceless ‚Äì total confusion and lots of laughs. I'll definitely order again!
reviews.review4: The package was so absurd that you can't help but laugh. The recipient thought it was a mistake for days. Hilarious idea!
reviews.review5: I didn't expect this kind of reaction! My friend was completely shocked and speechless. Awesome idea for a funny surprise!

cta.title: Don't know what to give someone who has everything?
cta.description: Give them something they definitely don't have ‚Äì a premium portion of first-class crappy manure! This will be the most unforgettable and fragrant gift of their life!
cta.subtitle: Order now and make the world a little more‚Ä¶ aromatic!
cta.ps: P.S. Remember, our manure isn't just a brilliant way to get revenge‚Äîit also makes an excellent fertilizer for gardens and plants! So if your target happens to be a gardening enthusiast, you'll be giving them a double gift!
